name: 20nine Restaurant & Wine Bar
address: 255 E Basse Rd Ste 940 San Antonio, TX  78209
review description: Calamari was nicely seasoned, the breaded chicken breast was outstanding. Highly recommend!

name: Ácenar
address: 146 East Houston San Antonio, TX  78205
review description: Love the ambiance! Very groovy, oranges & browns. Right on the RiverWalk, so outside dining would be fun, although we chose to eat indoors.Note to all diners: Ask your server for recommendations - and then TAKE THEM. We asked Jeffrey for his suggestions of menu items that are specific to Ácenar - and there are many to choose from. (No point in ordering a cheese enchilada when there's a duck chalupa on the menu!) He gave us his personal favorites, as well as what other guests have recommended. We were not disappointed. Both my Fish Veracruz & my partner's Pork Tenderloin were outstanding in every way.Jeffrey also hooked us up w/ a jalapeño-based cream salsa that was well worth the $2.95.

name: Achiote - Grand Hyatt San Antonio
address: 600 E. Market St. San Antonio, TX  78205
review description: For our first visit, we went specifically for the daily buffet. We arrived @ 130P, the buffet ends @ 200P, and we NEVER felt rushed; instead, all of the food, including the beef tenderloin, lamb, chicken sausage, and the guy that carves them, stayed available until we were finished. We enjoyed *everything* that we ate. Of special note was our server, Beth - attentive but not too, friendly but not too, available but not too - we hate "hovering," and Beth was perfect in every way. She is also a genuinely interesting & delightful person. My partner and I felt completely comfortable w/ her, and w/ all of the staff @ Achiote. We will definitely return on our next visit to SA - may even go back for dinner tomorrow.

name: Aldino Cucina Italiano
address: 1203 N Loop 1604 W  #101 San Antonio, TX  78258
review description: The best flounder we've ever had! - fresh, moist and perfectly prepared with a light, delicious sauce. Our waitress was charming, friendly and extremely efficient. We highly recommend this restaurant.

name: Aldo's Ristorante Italiano
address: 8539 Fredericksburg Rd San Antonio, TX  78229
review description: I really like this restaurant. Considering nothing is perfect, this restaurant comes as close to it as any other restaurant in San Antonio.

name: Antlers Lodge
address: 9800 Hyatt Resort Drive San Antonio, TX  78251
review description: Awesome time from start to finish. We enjoyed the menu especially the game. Will be back soon

name: Bella...On The River
address: 106 River Walk San Antonio, TX  78205
review description: Bella is a true Gem! I took my wife out for her birthday along with our teen age children and they had something for everyone. The atmosphere was warm and cozy and full of energy...very European! Their appetizers and salads were amazing as well as the main dishes. The owner was kind enough to send over a small dessert with a candle which was a perfect end to our evening. My wife and I will be back with a small group of friends to spend the evening sampling all of the appetizers along with a few bottles of wine.

name: Biga on the Banks
address: 203 S. St. Mary's St. San Antonio, TX  78205
review description: My husband and I were visiting San Antonio for the weekend and visited based on the excellent reviews. We were certainly not disappointed. The cheese plate is delicious but the real gems were our two entrees. My husband had the pork tenderloin; it was so tender you could cut it with a fork. I had the steak, which included an amazing combination of flavors. The berry dessert was to die for as well. We will definitely return next time we are in town.

name: Bliss Restaurant
address: 926 S Presa Street San Antonio, TX  78210
review description: Great service. Server was excellent and provided great recommendations.

name: Bohanan's Prime Steaks and Seafood
address: 219 East Houston Street Suite 275 San Antonio, TX  78205
review description: I loved the atmosphere and the food was EXCELLENT! I have to go back some day, even though I live out of town. It will be in my top list of favorite restaurants and my dinner was memorable.

name: Bourbon Street Seafood Kitchen
address: 2815 North Loop 1604 E. San Antonio, TX  78232
review description: My favorite cajun seafood restaurant!

name: Brannon's Cafe
address: 16641 La Cantera Parkway San Antonio, TX  78256
review description: Very attentive and courteous service. Menu was unique and food was delicious!

name: Cappy's Restaurant
address: 5011 Broadway San Antonio, TX  78209
review description: As always, We had a great time with great food, sevice, and ambiance. We love Cappy's for special occasions.

name: Chart House Restaurant - Tower of the Americas
address: 601 Tower of the Americas Way San Antonio, TX  78205
review description: service was sketcky, even though only half full for lunch on Sunday. We were rushed when we arrived and to order things but then attention and help was hard to get. Several things we ordered did not show up with asking for again. potatoes were cold.

name: Citrus @ Hotel Valencia Riverwalk
address: 150 East Houston St. San Antonio, TX  78205
review description: Great food all around.Shrimp appetizers were plentiful and filling. 1 order was enough for two.Tomato salad was also delicious.Kristi, our waitress, recommended the Snapper which was very good and complemented by the caramelized onion and whatever type of grain it was served over.The original bottle of wine I ordered was out of stock but she recommended an excellent replacement. Which we went out and bought a bottle for the house.Thank you Kristi for your excellent service and charming personality.Slight draw back was the extreme quietness of the restaurant. There was no low playing or mild mood music and I could hear nearby conversations. The clanking of people dining was also noticeable due how quiet it was.

name: Drew's American Grill
address: 18740 Stone Oak Parkway San Antonio, TX  78258
review description: We were celebrating a birthday and this was his pick. This was our first visit and we were very pleased with the food and service. Another visit is definitely in our future.

name: Esquire Tavern
address: 155 East Commerce San Antonio, TX  78205
review description: A local place to see for the bar. On that note, menu is limited, fried bar food. View and ambiance are the highlight here.

name: Fleming's Prime Steakhouse & Wine Bar - San Antonio
address: 255 East Basse Road Suite 200 San Antonio, TX  78209
review description: Great service, wine selection was awesome and the food was great! I especially liked the small plate option which is perfect when you don't want to stuff yourself! We will be back, soon!!

name: Francesca's at Sunset
address: 16641 La Cantera Parkway San Antonio, TX  78256
review description: Food was exquisite, view was fantastic and service was exceptional.

name: Frederick's Bistro
address: 14439 NW Military Highway Suite 100 San Antonio, TX  78231
review description: As usual, food and service were wonderful. I had the lamb chops - so delicious! One of my dining partners had the stuffed chicken and she was very happy with her entree. Will definitely be back!

name: The Gruene Door
address: 2360 Gruene Lake Dr New Braunfels, TX  78130
review description: Mostly enjoyed my first visit.The noise level was very very loud and it made conversation at the table very difficult. There was a party of 16 at a long table and they were enjoying themseves. We all had steak, 2 were cooked perfectly and one had to be sent back because it was undercooked and cold in the center. Our appetizers were very Yummy. The harvest squash soup was delicious-as were the spinach salads. Will make a second visit, but maybe not until the fall so we can sit outside away from the din! Service was very professional and I liked the wine menue.

name: Jerusalem Grill
address: 3259 Wurzbach Rd San Antonio, TX  78238
review description: The service was excellent. I liked the atmosphere. I will be back. Thanks

name: JW Marriott San Antonio - 18 Oaks
address: 23808 Resort Parkway San Antonio, TX  78261
review description: Was our first time here and I throughly enjoyed it. We live within 5 miles from the hotel and we will definitely be a patron again. The customer service was unbelievable. Thank you for making father's day extra special for my golf loving husband!

name: JW Marriott San Antonio - Cibolo Moon
address: 23808 Resort Parkway San Antonio, TX  23808
review description: The wine list is very limited.... very few choices if you are into wine. The menu is also limited. Very pleasant atmosphere and decor... nice view of the JW Marriott grounds.

name: JW Marriott San Antonio - High Velocity
address: 23808 Resort Pkwy San Antonio, TX  78261
review description: We were just going to eat & have some drinks, then the Hostess let me know about a Special Beer Pairing Dinner. So glad she did. We had a group of 6 & we all had a Fabulous time! We will definitely be going again! Thanks!

name: Kirby's Prime Steakhouse - San Antonio
address: 123 N. Loop 1604 San Antonio, TX  78232
review description: Steaks were excellent. Not a quiet place for a romantic dinner.

name: Kona Grill - San Antonio
address: 15900 La Cantera Parkway The Shops At La Cantera San Antonio, TX  78256
review description: Enjoyed the food and service! My dining companion had the pork loin, which I had a bite of, it was delicious! I had the mac-nut chicken, so tasty, reminded me of Hawaii! We will definitely return to Kona to try other dishes.

name: La Barataria
address: 3500 Island Moorings Pkwy Port Aransas, TX  78373
review description: Appetizers are great but the main courses are not so much. Service was slow and unprofessional.

name: La Cascada - The Resort at Tapatio Springs
address: 314 Blue Heron Blvd. Boerne, TX  78006
review description: We celebrated our anniversary at La Cascada and had a wonderful time. The food was excellent and the vie outstanding.

name: La Fonda on Main
address: 2415 N. Main Ave San Antonio, TX  78212
review description: Kudos for the on-line reservation system. Excellent menu options, reasonably priced, and the LaFonda Special is superb. Will definitely recommend to friends.

name: Las Canarias - Omni La Mansion
address: 112 College Street San Antonio, TX  78205
review description: Outstanding European quality cuisine with a touch of Texas. A beautiful historic San Antonio landmark setting. Impeccable friendly service. Great music from an engaging expert Classical Spanish Guitarist that has played there for decades. Good for romantic rendezvous (we got engaged there) and large parties (we held our rehearsal dinner there). The riverside patio is also our favorite lunch stop when strolling the Riverwalk. Enjoy!

name: Las Ramblas at Hotel Contessa
address: 306 West Market Street San Antonio, TX  78205
review description: overall, food was fair...service was good

name: Liberty Bistro
address: 200 N. Seguin Ave. New Braunfels, TX  78130
review description: This restaurant doesn't use OpenTable properly. We made reservations for the same evening but when we came to the restaurant, she had a paper pad reservation and did not receive our OpenTable reservation. She told me they will give us the next available time. After waiting for 20 min, we were told that we need to wait 20 more. At that point we left.

name: The Little Aussie Bakery & Cafe
address: 3610 Avenue B San Antonio, TX  78209
review description: It's a quiet little spot with a focus on serving great tasting food to finicky people. They do gluten-free with flair. Only EVOO. The mango chicken is the best chicken I've had in forever.

name: Little Gretel
address: 518 River Rd. Boerne, TX  78006
review description: We took my dad there for Father's Day brunch and the food,setting and service were all fabulous. We all tried something different from Eggs Benedict, The Reuben, Crabcake Salad, Lox, Sausage Trio plate and my 2 year old especially loved the mac n cheese fritters. We will certainly be back. We had fun feeding the ducks across the street when we were finished too. 5 Stars across the board!

name: Luce Ristorante E Enoteca
address: 11255 Huebner Rd San Antonio, TX  78230
review description: Luce continues to maintain a high standard of cuisine and service over its entire existence.

name: Lüke San Antonio
address: 125 E. Houston St. San Antonio, TX  78205
review description: Always exceptional. The service and food are top notch. I never tire of going to this restaurant. I consider it among the best in the entire state of Texas.

name: Maggiano's - San Antonio
address: 17603 Interstate I-10 W San Antonio, TX  78257
review description: The best part was the pre-dinner cocktails, went down hill from there.. Artichoke dip, below average (tastes like it came out of a can) bread was average, spinach salad was OK, too much dressing and definitely not worth $13 eggplant Parmesan was below average, next time I'll stick to costco's !Ps: crime brûlée was decent and good size..Sorry wasn't worth the money, or the wait

name: MAX's Wine Dive - San Antonio
address: 340 East Basse Road, Suite 101 San Antonio, TX  78209
review description: Fried chicken was delicious, service great! Thoroughly enjoyed the wine. This place is a must for wine enthusiasts!

name: The Melting Pot - San Antonio
address: 14855 Blanco Rd,  Suite 110 San Antonio, TX  78216
review description: We always enjoy going to The Melting Pot for special occassions. The food is delicious and well portioned.

name: Morton's The Steakhouse - San Antonio
address: 300 E. Crockett Street Suite 283 San Antonio, TX  78205
review description: I used to come to Morton's for the presentation by their waiters.They now just hand you a menu. I'm told this changed since Landrys acquired them

name: Myron's at Alon Town Center
address: 10003 NW Military Hwy, Ste 2101 San Antonio, TX  78231
review description: Myron's far exceeded my expectation. We had wonderful service and delicious food. Who could ask for more in an evening? I would definitely return.

name: Myron's Prime Steak House
address: 136 N Castell New Braunfels, TX  78130
review description: Delicious food, and top-notch service

name: NAO
address: 312 Pearl Parkway Bldg 2 Suite 2102 San Antonio, TX  78215
review description: Beautiful restaurant with superior service. I liked the set price for a selection of a cold item and warm item, plus an entree. but it was difficult to know what we were eating as we were not familiar with the ingredients. Waiter was very helpful in helping us understand choice selection. Maybe we just don't quite understand latin cuisine and it will have to grow on us as we become more familiar with their vegetables and recipes. We were there for the soft opening.

name: Old San Francisco
address: 10223 Sahara St San Antonio, TX  78216
review description: Ate there back in 1970, glad to see it hasn't changed. Food and service was excellent.

name: Oro at The Emily Morgan Hotel
address: 705 E Houston Street San Antonio, TX  78205
review description: We were the only customers, but out waiter could not be bothered to serve us, check on us ir refill our beverages.

name: Ostra at Mokara Hotel & Spa
address: 212 W. Crockett St. San Antonio, TX  78205
review description: The food at Ostra is amazing! A great place for celebrating a special occasion.

name: Ounce Steakhouse
address: 1401 N Loop 1604 W Suite 105 San Antonio, TX  78258
review description: Great Food and Great Service. We will definately be back.

name: Palm Restaurant - San Antonio
address: 233 East Houston Street San Antonio, TX  78205
review description: The food was incredible, as was the service... We'll definitely be back!

name: Paloma Blanca Mexican Cuisine
address: 5800 Broadway San Antonio, TX  78209
review description: Our server Hector was top notch. Every time we go to this restaurant, the service is always excellent. Great margaritas and they don't skimp on the quality of the food they purchase like many places do. I had never had a tenderloin taco before!

name: Perry's Steakhouse & Grille-San Antonio
address: 15900 La Cantera Parkway Suite 22200 San Antonio, TX  78256
review description: Great food, great service......ALWAYS. Managers are visible and friendly. A well run restaurant. We'll definitely return.

name: Piatti - San Antonio
address: 255 East Basse Street San Antonio, TX  78209
review description: We have loved Piatti for years...authentic Italian likemy Italian husband ate in New York City. Now great! We have a reservation to go back.

name: Q on the Riverwalk - Hyatt Regency
address: 123 Losoya St San Antonio, TX  78205
review description: I was suspicious of a bbq restaraunt in a major hotel and I should have followed my instincts: we ordered the baby back ribs and when they arived the presentation was appealing however the ribs were tasteless with a blah sauce. Our server was great and the wine ist was acceptable. If Q can ramp up the food, this could be a geat dining experience.

name: Restaurant Gwendolyn
address: 152 E. Pecan, #100 San Antonio, TX  78205
review description: Fabulous food and service. Conscientious dedication to decreasing the carbon footprint of food preparation and supporting the local farmer/rancher.

name: Roaring Fork San Antonio
address: 1806 NW Loop 1604 San Antonio, TX  78248
review description: The Mac n cheese is always my favorite. I also love the calamari at wildfish but the don't make there Mac and cheese the same and this was the main reason I went. Wish they made the green one at wildfish. Then I would be there more often

name: RoMo's Cafe
address: 7627 Culebra Ste 107 San Antonio, TX  78251
review description: Our frist time, loved the french fries, all of us had sandwhiches which were good. Will go back to try some of the entreees,

name: Ruth's Chris Steak House - San Antonio (Airport)
address: 7720 Jones Maltsberger Concord Plaza San Antonio, TX  78216
review description: Still the best steakhouse in town. First on our list for special occasions.

name: Ruth's Chris Steak House - San Antonio (Downtown)
address: 1170 E. Commerce Street Sunset Station St. Paul Square San Antonio, TX  78205
review description: Cesar did an excellent job of providing top notch service and the food and the evening were excellent.

name: Sazo's Latin Grill
address: 101 Bowie Street San Antonio, TX  78205
review description: It is a hotel restaurant attached to the Marriott Riverfront. When I arrived a few minutes early for my reservation, they told me that they were closing because they didn't have enough diners. So much for that.

name: Scuzzi's Italian Grill
address: 4035 N Loop 1604 W, Ste 102 San Antonio, TX  78257
review description: 6th dinner visit with friends. Good, dependable, but not a standout. However, everyone left happy.

name: Silo Elevated Cuisine - 1604
address: 434 N.Loop 1604 West San Antonio, TX  78232
review description: Excellent service- rob was incredible in his recommendations, promptness, etc. food was excellent- the grouper special was superb and the chicken fried oysters also. The vegetarian risotto was good, but definitely the least favorite of our party. Highly recommend

name: Silo Elevated Cuisine - Alamo Heights
address: 1133 Austin Hwy San Antonio, TX  78209
review description: Delicious as usual! The quail appetizer was amazing; I was a bit dissapointed with my entree - the risotto wasn't as creamy as I expected, but the grilled veggies were excellent - especially the portabellos!

name: Stone Werks - Lincoln Heights
address: 999 East Basse,Suite 130 San Antonio, TX  78209
review description: Mother's Day - food was less than normal, not bad but not great either. Service was also sporadic - good for a while then non-existent then good again.

name: Stone Werks - The Rim
address: 5807 Worth Pkwy San Antonio, TX  78257
review description: Ambiance is nice, but kind of noisy--better for large groups. Would recommend more for drinks and apps than dinner. Dinner meals are average, not great for the price. Burgers are probably most reasonable.

name: Stone Werks - The Vineyard
address: 1201 N Loop 1604 W #101 San Antonio, TX  78258
review description: Greg was an awesome waiter. Loved that when we were a little late, they called to check if we were coming instead of giving the table away.Also, we had a great table!

name: Sushi Zushi - Colonnade
address: 9867 IH-10 W San Antonio, TX  78230
review description: Food was great but service was slow and lacked enthusiasmOveral an average experienceStill a great place for everyday eating

name: Sushi Zushi - Downtown
address: 203 South Saint Mary's San Antonio, TX  78205
review description: Great sushi and great service - thank you Daniel!!

name: Sushi Zushi - Lincoln Heights
address: 999 E. Basse Road Ste. 186 San Antonio, TX  78209
review description: Sushi Zushi is our go-to option when we don't feel like making dinner. Food is good, consistent, and servers are always nice, we've never had a problem. I will say the Lincoln heights location is usually pretty noisy which is good if you have a group. One dissapointing dish we ordered, which doesn't happen much, was an appetizer of seared tuna crusted with pepper. Came with little hint of pepper and none of the sauce that was supposed to be on it, and was a pretty small portion.

name: Sustenio - Eilan Hotel
address: 17103 La Cantera Parkway San Antonio, TX  78256
review description: Had the filet with the chile in nogada,it was good ! except for the small size of the filet no more than 3oz. looked like the end of the tip. for $41.00 they need to have at list 6 to 8 oz portion .

name: Toscana Ristorante - Downtown
address: 301 E. Houston St. San Antonio, TX  78205
review description: 2nd time eating here. Food was good but not exceptional. Bar service is slow. Waitstaff is polite, pleasant & attentive but unpolished ... clearly they are lacking in training.

name: Tre Trattoria Downtown
address: 401 S. Alamo San Antonio, TX  78205
review description: I really want to like this place, but they just can't seem to get their act together. The food ranges from "OK" to "Outstanding" - same with the service! We were there for Sunday Brunch and the memosas were great. Three of the six entrees were "outstanding" - the fried chicken with waffles, the steak and eggs and the pork chop. The other three, not so much - green eggs & ham, duck confit hash and breakfast pizza - they were not bad, just not much to them. Very little ham and very little duck; the pizza was unremarkable. Just not what we expect for the price.

name: Wildfish Seafood Grille - San Antonio
address: 1834 NW Loop 1604 San Antonio, TX  78248
review description: Normally an excellent choice for hosting visiting client dinners. This particular visit was the first I've encountered lackluster service.

name: Zinc Bistro & Wine Bar
address: 207 North Presa Street San Antonio, TX  78205
review description: I took a friend here for lunch. I had shrimp which was excellent. There are several other menu items I would like to try in the future. I would also like to return when the weather is cool enough to sit outside in the quaint courtyard.

name: Zocca
address: 420 W. Market Street San Antonio, TX  78205
review description: Although was an expensive night, the overall expirience was great!

name: Z'Tejas San Antonio
address: 15900 La Cantera Parkway Ste 25100 San Antonio, TX  78256
review description: Our children got mac n' cheese even though the waitress explained that it was homemade (and not from a box!) Alas, the girls didn't like it. But when the waitress checked on our meals, she quickly replaced the meals with chicken strips instead, which was really nice. The manager even came over to check on us, which we thought was especially thoughtful considering children are often passed over in restaurants when they don't like their food (because they're kids...and that means picky!) Then he came back once they got the chicken fingers to ask if they were better. It was really appreciated and that alone made the service really stand out. Thanks!
